headline: Your role is a senior editor of a photo magazine. Describe the subject and the overall mood of the image in a headline with less than 12 words.
abstract: Your role is a visitor in an art gallery. You are visiting an exibition of fine art travel photographs. Create a very precise summary about the image with less than 400 characters.
keywords: Your role is a travel photographer. Find a list of %(KW_NUM)s comma seperated single keywords describing the image and the overall mood of the image
